original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2471)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2471)@</color>召喚飛刀，從天而降以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2471)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2471)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2471)@</color> summons flying knives, descending from the sky with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2471)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> to cause physical damage to the enemy.
